desc: Fresno Suit Outlet introduced the concept of 3 Belts, 3 Ties, 3 Shirts, 3 Suits, 3 Hankies and 3 Pairs of Socks to the city of Fresno. It also features Tuxedos on its suit line. layout.text: THE #1 SUIT RETAILER IN SAN JOAQUIN VALLEY
